alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts; Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 01 at 9:25PM MST until March 02 at 1:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM MST TONIGHT ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches are expected above 3000 feet... with 8 to 14 inches above 5000 feet. A foot or more is expected above 7000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...In Arizona, Northwest Plateau and Northwest Deserts. * WHEN...Until 1 AM MST Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
